About

This is a Google Material Design Lite Jekyll theme. The index page is based on the text-only template (source). The post page (and this page) is based on the article template (source). Some SVGs were found on iconfinder.com Bacon Lorem Ipsum generator was used for generating some text.

You can find out more info about customizing your Jekyll theme, as well as basic Jekyll usage documentation at jekyllrb.com

You can find the source code for the mdl-jekyll theme at: github.com/getaclue/mdl-jekyll

You can find the source code for Jekyll at github.com/jekyll/jekyll
